title: Parampara
description: A place to celebrate, preserve, and explore family rituals across India.
fullDescription: Parampara is a simple cultural platform where users can document, preserve, and share their family rituals and traditions. It helps people stay connected to their roots through well-structured ritual entries and an easy-to-use, modern interface.
features: Follow users to discover new cultural practices

title: Next-Problem
description: Find the next problem to solve on your CP journey
fullDescription: Next-Problem helps competitive programmers practice smarter by suggesting 10 problems tailored to their skill level. Just enter your Codeforces username and get instant, personalized recommendations.

title: Om Tours
description: The travel agent of the future
fullDescription: An agentic AI travel planner that builds custom trips using inputs like source, destination, dates, budget, group size, travel mode, and purpose. It delivers optimized itineraries, smart suggestions, and seamless end-to-end planning.

title: Animegen
description: Convert boring novels into colorful comics
fullDescription: AnimeGen takes a written story, splits it into scenes, and turns each one into an anime-style image, creating a simple visual storytelling experience.
features: Generates anime-style images for each scene
Displays results in a clean slideshow

title: MinimalANN
fullDescription: minimalANN is a lightweight Python framework for building and training fully connected neural networks from scratch. It focuses on core learning concepts like backpropagation while remaining simple, intuitive, and resource-efficient for low-power systems.
features: Create and train fully connected neural networks from scratch
Minimal, intuitive design focused on educational clarity
Optimized for free-tier CPU environments with limited resources
Minimal memory footprint suitable for edge and IoT devices

title: PyShell
description: A minimal shell clone built in Python
fullDescription: PyShell is a lightweight shell clone written in Python to explore how command-line interfaces work internally. It focuses on implementing core shell behavior such as command parsing, built-in commands, interactive history navigation, and quote handling.
features: Supports core shell builtins: echo, pwd, type, history, exit
Interactive command history navigation using up/down arrow keys
Proper handling of single and double quotes in echo
